mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and reduce text size for better viewing on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Compress and optimize images to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Implement structured data (schema.org) and optimize metadata (titles, descriptions) for better search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation clarity by adding clear calls to action for booking and location details.
bookingFlowTip: Ensure the booking process is streamlined with minimal steps for a smoother user experience.
tips: Consider adding social media links to improve engagement.
Update content regularly to enhance SEO and user engagement.
